template.description: This queries the ES index containing the free text field (in this case 'document') and then posts the text to the MedCAT service where it returns the text with its annotations, it stores the annotations in a separate ES index.
template.name: Ingest_raw_text_into_ES_and_annotate_from_ES_to_ES_SSL

labels.label: query free text Cogstack ES -> annotate with MedCAT -> Ingest annotations into ES
